name: webextension-email-address-plus
description: Automatically generate labeled email addresses for better organization and spam protection. Adds website-specific labels to your email when filling forms.
author: kud

scripts.publish:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const changelog=fs.readFileSync('CHANGELOG.md','utf8'); const sections=changelog.split(/## \[/); const firstSection=sections[1]; const match=firstSection?firstSection.split(/
(?=## )/)[0]:''; const lines=match.split('
').slice(1); const notes=lines.join('
').trim(); fs.writeFileSync('.amo-metadata.json', JSON.stringify({release_notes:{en:notes}}, null, 2));" && web-ext sign --channel=listed --upload-source-code --amo-metadata=.amo-metadata.json
scripts.publish:help: echo 'To publish: 1) Get API credentials from https://addons.mozilla.org/developers/addon/api/key/ 2) Run: web-ext sign --api-key=YOUR_KEY --api-secret=YOUR_SECRET --channel=listed'

'); const fs=require('fs'); const changelog=fs.readFileSync('CHANGELOG.md','utf8'); const today=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; const newEntry='## ['+pkg.version+'] - '+today+'

### Changed

'; const headerMatch=changelog.match(/(# Changelog[\s\S]*?
